subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The late calls by replacement officials in Monday night’s N.F.L. game, on the final play especially, marred an otherwise magical finish and struck at the very integrity of the sport.
snippet: The late calls by replacement officials in Monday night’s N.F.L. game, on the final play especially, marred an otherwise magical finish and struck at the very integrity of the sport.
